website_summaries.verdict: The LG G2 is both super-sized and super-powerful, but it doesn't quite match the mighty Samsung Galaxy S4, our Editors' Choice Android smartphone on Verizon.
cons: Processor benefit doesn't play out in apps

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone because it had high end specs and the price was reasonable. The description of the condition of the phone said "Greater than normal amount of wear" so I didn't expect much. To my surprise the screen only had 4 or 5 small scratches! It also functions perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, battery might be old, works with prepaid Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price, still better than most new androids in same price range. Always look for a 2gb memory for decent experience and 16-32 gb atleast of storage. That will allow you to get enough apps instead of a few. Picking from g3 and g2, I went with g2 because of lower battery drain and cheaper than g3 and with research they are similar in specs, even though g3 is still better but battery lasts less. Otherwise this is a great phone even for 2016 for a hundred bucks. Only issue I'm having is the battery draining so fast, so I bought a new one and hopefully that will fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Meowke

customer_reviews.title: I would take a picture of it but I'm too lazy to get a real camera
customer_reviews.text: Good for a used phone. I expected it to not work like new for the price I paid and, again, the fact that it was used. It was working fine for maybe 4 to 5 months but now it is SCREWED UP and it is making me a bitter person (more than I already am). I don't know if it is the software or the hardware, but I'm blaming it on the fact that I bought a used phone. So I'm not mad at the seller, I am mad at myself for buying a used phone. Sorry I keep saying used phone. How 'bout previously owned. Yeah, that's better. But now my review is over so it doesn't even matter.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Screen, 13mp camera is better than the $300 cameras of the mid 2000's, all in the palm of your hand.
customer_reviews.text: UNBELIEVABLE SCREEN!!! This is a fabulous phone, great ease of use. there are so many features and so much technology, it will take you a moment or two to learn, but that's the same for any technology these days. excellent camera. nice build quality. excellent battery life. Did I mention the SCREEN IS AMAZEBALLS!?!?! GREAT SCREEN, gorgeous picture... I purchased the ditztronic case here on amazon for it, it's very snug with an excellent fit and finish. Did I mention the amazing screen yet? Camera is equally amazing. only negative, speakerphone clarity is mediocre. I have the Verizon model which only has one speaker for the speakerphone, ATT/Sprint/Tmobile all reportedly have two smaller ones. Either way, this thing rocks.
customer_reviews.author: ricomania

customer_reviews.title: absolutely in love with the G2!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone has everything I need and way more. Light weight, sensitive to touch (but not overly sensitive like the HTC Evo), better texting options, beautiful screen, wonderful camera, speakers get pretty loud, built in screen shot, very customizable. I thought the back buttons would be a little awkward but they are very comfortable and well placed. The T.V remote function is a little over the top but still extremely cool!!!! I have so much fun changing the channel randomly when my boyfriend isnt noticing!! Its really nice being able to look at your phone and know who texted you because of the color of the light flashing on the front. This is the best phone on the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Perkins

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret getting this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am coming from a Motorola droid biopic and this phone is better in every way. My wife has a Samsung S4" that I was going to take when she goes,back to an iPhone, but I read some reviews on this phone and could get this for a penny on Amazon. How great is that!?! I wish it had a removable battery because I'm a little paranoid about running out of juice. It really isn't an issue though because the battery lasts longer than the heavy extended life battery I had in my Bionic. At 32Gig, it has plenty of storage space for me even without a micro sd card. You will not regret getting this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Infidel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is phone is slick, fast and has great screen. There are many new software features which make it easeir to use than ever. Battery life is 2x longer than other phones. Double tap is eay to use, and buttons on the back are not really needed. My concerns are phone is too slippery and in the first month I dropped it more times than prev Nexus4 phone in 1 year. Another problem is typing on LG keyboard produces too many typos and needs corrections, going to try Google keyboard...
customer_reviews.author: Victor Gavrilenko

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like new. No scratches. Love the controls in the back. My other phone I kept hitting the controls on the side. Very easy to use as I am over 70 years old & not good with electronics. The only draw back is that when I went to Verizon to initiate service, they told me the phone had come in contact with water (a color change in the strip where Verizon puts there connection). I don't know if that's true? Anyway, the phone works great. I get terrific reception where I live. Couldn't get any bars on my old phone & different service provider. I would definitely recommend this phone to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Dead at 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this LG G2 on August 24 (invoice attached) through Amazon. According to the website, the warranty is for 1 year, and as I've only had it for 9 months, it should still be under warranty. My phone suddenly will not take or hold a charge and will not boot up/turn on. I tried to contact the seller with the information given in the warranty statement. The email is not valid, and I can't understand a word of the recording that I get when I dial the 800 number. Charlie Brown's mom is more intelligible! Does anyone know where I can get this serviced?
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: LG G2 or Galaxy S4
customer_reviews.text: Had my G2 for a month now. Likes speed, screen size and picture clarity, easy to work with once you get through all the bloatware. It's subjective but I like the button placement. Cameras are good and easy to use. Dislikes too much extra software. (bloatware). double tap start only works about half the time. I know a couple of people with S4s and they like them but everyone seems to be impressed with the picture on the G2. For me price was the deciding factor ($7.49 on an Amazon special) and I'm happy with my choice
customer_reviews.author: moviesme

customer_reviews.title: Best Android phone 2013.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the htc one x, iphone 4 and 5, htc one, galaxy s3 and the lumia 1020. Nothing compares to the battery life and screen quality/slim bezels of this phone. I never realized the value of a large battery/long lasting phone, but this takes the cake. The speakers don't compare to the HTC One, and the camera isn't as good as the lumia, but I would not hesitate to recommend this over all other phones right now. The back buttons didn't bother me because of the awesome "Knock-On" feature. Go LG!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This LG G2 design is poor, turning it off and on is a nigtmare, such sensitivity even after adjusting it in the settings is stupid. Palette,brightness, sound audio is purely A+, however I am not using the phone my mother who I bought it for hates it to death. Don't buy this if your looking for an android phone for under 150.00 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: maiku-tech

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone but less choice for cases
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is great and no complains. But there are less choice for cases especially for Verizon version. Verizon version is slightly thicker and G2 cases for other carrier or international version does not fit. I bought this for my wife and my wife eager to colorful cases but ended up with black quickwindow case.... Except the case choice, overall she is very happy with display, sound and camera qualities. Pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: NRW

customer_reviews.title: Like my LG G2
customer_reviews.text: The LG G2 is the best phone I have bought in years.. even better than my iPhone 5. Love the user interface and all the apps I had on my iPhone, I have on my G2. Love he larger screen. Still learning the ins and outs of the phone but glad I bought it. I just wish AT&T would get it upgraded to KitKat (Andriod 4.4) Also had a bit of a challenge finding a good case for it but did find on on Amazon. And the price of the phone at the time was1 cents for the upgrade when AT&T wanted $49.99 for the upgrade. WOOT!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Loving this phone. I came from using an iPhone for 3 years, so I was nervous about switching. I'm glad I switched. I love the size of the screen, the ease of using the numbers without having to switch screens,like on iPhone, and the camera takes great pictures. The volume keys on the back are great; so much easier to use. I also love the knock on screen. On the iPhone you would have to use the power button to shut off the screen, but after two years on the iPhone, the button would no longer press down. The battery life is great too. Overall I am very impressed and happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone. Very little pre-installed bloatware. You can customize literally every aspect of the UI to your liking. Lots of great widgets that can be resized to your taste. Speaker quality is great, my ringtones sound much better than they did on my old phone. Camera is decent. Screen size and quality is optimum. The only issue I had with it is not really even an issue. The pre-installed ringtones are terrible boarding on nightmare causing. But I don't know many people who use default ringtones.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite phone that I've owned or used (including an S4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Behind only a Note 3 that sadly is no more, this is my favorite phone that I've owned or used (including an S4 and an HTC One M7). The Knock-On feature is unbelivably nice to have. Display quality is very good and it has not been glitchy in the least. The stock launcher is probably my least favorite part about it, but that is more of a preference. Plenty of options available to fix that. Overall, you can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: LG G2 has GREAT battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I can listen to audio books, or music for 8 hours at work via bluetooth, and still have battery life left. It charges fast too. Talk to text seems to work much better with this phone then my old Samsung Charge. The camera works well too. Rear power switch is taking a little getting used to, but you can tap on the screen to turn it on also. I am very pleased with this phone, and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Scot from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with the LG G2
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for a few months now and I am very satisfied. The double tap wake feature is a simple yet awesome idea. Phone is very responsive and lots of apps run great on it. Battery life has also been impressive, in which I can leave it without charging for 2 to sometimes 3 days with light usage. Screen is great as well. Only downside is camera can be a little wonky with focusing. As long as it focuses correctly the pictures look great though.
customer_reviews.author: holtee

customer_reviews.title: Remember who actually makes the NEXUS.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this phone for the .01 price tag, added it to my att account, but now that I have it? So worth it. I'm nearly ALWAYS on my phone, and after 10 hours, I'm still dealing with more than half of the battery charge. The interface is smooth, clean, easily adjusted, and very fun. This is a solidly constructed phone, and very easily used. People should know this phone's value. No, it's not a samsung, a moto, or an HTC. I have had them all. I have this now...and it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nittfox

customer_reviews.title: Greatest phone ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous phone. Great alternative to the iPhone. (I don't do Apple products.) It's got everything I could ever want. GPS, voice typing, all the best apps... I love it. The touch screen did get finicky after about 12 months, but I'm at month 21 now and still using it!! I do have to charge it during the day sometimes, but I'd say that's normal. I'm really clumsy and this phone has held up to its fair share of bumps, scratches, and falls. No damage at all! Thanks, LG!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love the LG G series phones
customer_reviews.text: Love the LG G series phones. All work great! Super fast, decent camera..only thing I wish it had an outside SD slot.
customer_reviews.author: BettyWoap

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product - Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Touch Screen and other issues such as Tap On, etc. Did not show up for about 2 months when it was too late to return. Still in perfect condition, we get a notification that the touch screen has failed...can't even reset the thing. Cost of replacing the digitize is 50% of the current value of the phone....plus about 3 hours of my time. Simply a bad product and not what I've come to expect from Amazon or LG...or maybe I just got lucky prior to this product.
customer_reviews.author: TheGabe79

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Fast, smooth and great in most every way. The default sounds are incredibly lame but Zedge takes care of that. The screen is big bright and very responsive. The speakers are a little wimpy but ok. My only gripe - and this goes for most any phone other than Samsung - The US version doesn't have a microSD slot to pop another 32GB memory into it for $20. The onboard 32GB is pretty much adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best cell phone I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting a larger phone as I was used to wearing them in a case on my belt and was worried about keeping a phone in my pocket, but took the chance and glad of it. This is the best cell phone I've owned--large clear screen, easy to navigate and set up. Very good sound for phone calls (a priority for me), but good access to Internet and multiple email accounts. Now use my phone for many other things besides phone calls. Buying through Amazon a great choice: arrived quickly and one call to Verizon to get set up on my account, and saved $30 over Verizon price. I would definitely get this phone again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and beautiful all in one, a must have if your looking for great preformance, tools, games, movies, Video/photography, and almost all business or entertainment needs. This phone is amazing, the best i have ever owned and Verizon's service and ease of use is an amazing bundle. 100% recomend the LG G2 on Verizon the leader in 4G LTE service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: The pros to the G2 are a great battery life and a big screen. The rear button placement takes some getting used to but once you do it is fine. The camera is also really fast and takes nice pictures. Phone calls sound are clear and speakerphone gets pretty loud. One downside is that the antennas are placed at the bottom of the phone and not at the top. This means if you hold the phone at the bottom you loose a little signal strength or if don't hold it at the bottom the phone becomes awkward to hold. All in all, one of the best smartphones out there.
customer_reviews.author: yframe

customer_reviews.title: Would Gladly Buy Again!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! They arrived within 3 business days! The phones had very few marks on them. They even came with a full charge! I had NO issue getting them set up to my liking. Verizon had NO issue setting them up for their service. They work perfectly, even the battery! I would gladly buy these again!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ross

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: The phone looked as advertised towers after further inspection and 3 days off use found out the screen has issues. It glitches and some occasions becomes unusable. I did contact the seller and they simply wanted to give me a refund and did not address the problem or offer me a working phone. I ended up keeping the phone and dealing with its issues simply because I need my phone to keep in contact with my child who is 18 hours away. I will never buy another phone through this company.
customer_reviews.author: stacha

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Phone in excellent condition, but aftermarket charger. Constant messages ' charging slow, please use original charger. Have to leave plugged in all night and day. Bought an OEM charger and still battery dies in under 5 hours, no way to replace it. Leave it plugged in and still battery drains with light use.
customer_reviews.author: Personal shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone 3 months ago or so, mainly got this phone because it was available through Verizon, and it had really good reviews. I love this phone. It is bigger than my last phone, but thin and light. It doesn't feel bulky at all, I got a ultra-thin case for it as well. Takes great pictures, I love the crisp display, all that is great. The buttons on the back thing is a little weird at first, but you get used to it, i don't mind it at all anymore. All in all, great phone!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun C.

customer_reviews.title: Blazing Fast, Awesome Battery
customer_reviews.text: Stepping up to the G2 was a huge leap ahead from my Droid X. This phone has it all... great camera, crisp display, powerhouse processor, massive battery capacity, and on and on. The volume/lock buttons on the back take some getting used to, but it apparently allows the screen to be stretched closer to the edges of the phone, which makes for more viewing area compared to similarly sized phones.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: LG G2
customer_reviews.text: Beyond compare. This is the best phone, ever! I call it a mini tablet. It does everything my computer does and more. I can do any and everything I want with the LG G2. I bought this model as a gift and I became extremely jealous after I opened the package. Now, I really want the white pearl tone phone for myself. When I do purchase another phone it will definitely be the scratch resistant white LG G2.
customer_reviews.author: AMReddix

customer_reviews.title: The best phone
customer_reviews.text: The match between battery and stock ROM is the best. I have gone to 80 hours between stand-by and heavy Internet usage. Everything else works smooth. The camera application that comes with it is awesome. Also the QuickRemote application. Really nice and smooth experience I’m having.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés

customer_reviews.title: LG's the underdog for the phone industry.
customer_reviews.text: Was a fantastic product for the time not so much now.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Good Condition
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Exactly what I was looking for and much better condition than I expected in a used phone. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Major

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace the one I have with a cracked screen. Arrived on time and looked nearly new. Purchase price was nearly half the cost of fixing my old one. Works great, looks great, totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: charles m

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery on this phone doesn't last more than 2-3 hours fully charged. I literally can watch it drain by 1% every minute or so. It also lags during video and apparently people can't hear me clearly while talking on it regular but can hear me better while using the speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: lkpbxcat

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice buy! Seems like a all new G2
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice buy! Seems like a all new G2! However, the charger and the cable are kinda inferior. The cable was even a samsung one instead of LG! However, after all, I would recommend this to other people since it is totally worth its value.
customer_reviews.author: Fengnian Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone!
customer_reviews.text: At first, it takes little bit of time to get use to the this Android phone. Once you get the hang of it, it's the best cellular phone. This phone combined features on size of Samsung Galaxy Note & Iphone Ceri. And the price is just right compare to these competitor's phone. I am falling in love!
customer_reviews.author: Justine K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Incredible 2 replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had the black one for myself and I like it. I ordered this for my wife and she noticed the big difference in speed compared to her Incredible 2. Only negative is the low volume in Skype. The only app that has a low volume sound is very loud with everything else. This happened after it upgraded to kitkat
customer_reviews.author: AQS

customer_reviews.title: lack of quality control
customer_reviews.text: The phone has some kind of a screen malfunction less than 6 months in. Screen constantly shudders, phone actually self-diagnosed as having a screen malfunction. With almost any refurbished product, I would expect at least 12-24 months of problem free use, so I won't recommend this seller to others based on lack of quality control/testing on refurbished sales.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually write reviews, I've had this phone when it first came out and decided to buy it again because the first one took a swim. Battery life is pretty bad, all around. What I forgot about was how the apps never really worked, they crash, freeze, ETC. Overall the phone is slow. Camera is pretty good though.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: ... and couldnt because the main mother board was going bad. The charger we received with it was for ...
customer_reviews.text: We received the phone and went to turn it on and couldnt because the main mother board was going bad. The charger we received with it was for a samsung. And they only returned part of the money we paid after returning the phone.
customer_reviews.author: brian lowe

customer_reviews.title: best androd for the money
customer_reviews.text: this is one great Android phone; simply loving it. I had Samsung before, and this is way faster then S4. Great looks and very sharp screen. Only dont like is the buttons in the back, which you get use to of it. Camera is also one of the best for indoor and outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: M Asim qamar

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the lg g family the g2 was no exception was an amazing phone lasted me a long time
customer_reviews.author: Anthroxis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for an android. I personally prefer the iPHONE.
customer_reviews.author: DAPHNE K.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful phone and seller was great with fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone...It is fast and has features no other phone's have....the processor is better in the LG phones than other phone's...LG really stepped up...love it
customer_reviews.author: foxdi60

customer_reviews.title: Condition should be "Mint" !
customer_reviews.text: Condition should have been "Mint" not a scratch anywhere on the phone , was in brand new condition. I cracked the screen on my orginal g2 ( and no insurance) this was a great deal! Poped my SIM card in works perfect! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Broke screen 3 times
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the device enough to replace it three times due to broken glass from falls. Not me, my kid, and I don't know how severe the drop was to say if the screen broke too easy. We have a tougher case on it now. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about this phone except for the lack of SD card support. Not sure why in some markets(Korea I think) this phone supports 64GB, but not the US version of this phone! I just find this very odd. This just makes the point that nothing is perfect! :-) Still it is a 5-star phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It was an ok phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because I just wasn’t a fan of Samsung & Motorola always looked too much like a man’s phone. It really was a good phone at first but then I started having problems. I’m now an iPhone user but if I went back to android I would look at the LG phones.
customer_reviews.author: teammom

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This phone surpasses all others I have owned. For many years I was an LG girl, then I made the switch to Samsung and regretted it. So glad to be back in the LG world. It's reliable, durable and power packed! It's has a large bright screen and a thin lightweight body. Very very happy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Garmoe

customer_reviews.title: Strong phone- wifi software issues????
customer_reviews.text: Other than the well publicized issues with wifi connectivity, the G2 is an great phone. The speed to handle anything the app store throws at it and more. Haven't really run into any issues with battery life, which could be an issue later as you cannot replace the battery. Not having a SD slot could be seen as an issue but if you have a cloud-based storage, you should be fine. I have unlimited data so the wifi issue is not that big a deal but I could see it being one for those who don't have the advantage I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W Heneghan

customer_reviews.title: Product Exact
customer_reviews.text: My inherited G2 finally wore out so needed a new one like the old one and found it. G2 works great and just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first smartphone
customer_reviews.text: I have to disclose that this is my very first smartphone. Upgraded from a flip phone from Tracphone. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS GADGET!!!! I find it pretty easy to use, or at least figure out how to use it. After about a month of use I am hooked. I cannot compare it to an iphone, never used one.
customer_reviews.author: R Mac

customer_reviews.title: My First Smartphone...very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a large screen phone, that was already welled reviewed, at a low price. The LG G2 met my requirements and has proven to be quite intuitive, so using the many new features and apps has been enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Morris

customer_reviews.title: Truly remarkable phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. Before I bought the phone I scurried around the web trying to find and make a decision about if the buttons being on the back was going to ruin the experience. I found more positive feedback than negative so I took a leap and I was not disappointed. I am extremely satisfied with this phone and am happy to have the next couple years with it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: LG G2
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a good smart phone. But has a few issues. Battery doesn't last like it says it should. Speaker is weak. And GPS doesn't "lock" on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I has good functionality, but the battery sometimes drains quickly
customer_reviews.text: I has good functionality, but the battery sometimes drains quickly. It will work fine then all of a sudden heat up and the battery goes dead. I have closed all apps and the battery still gets drained. If the phone would stay charged for more than a few hours it would be a 5 star phone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone. The Knock to wake feature is the most handy extra on the phone. Plenty of power, very long battery life for a non-removable battery. It would have been nice if they included the wireless charging like the Verizon one but nothing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: G2 still relevant.
customer_reviews.text: I got this new phone on amazon for $150 less then it is on the Verizon website. Ya it came out two years ago but the screen is still amazing. Its super fast as promise. No complaints...yet.
customer_reviews.author: shack

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the G2. I searched and read reviews and tech specs and finally decided on the G2. I like the screen sz: 5.2, processor: 2.2ghz and overall size and design. I considered the HTC One, Samsung G4 Active and Motorola(I had an Atrix) which I really liked as well. This is the first LG phone I have had and it has been wonderful so far.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Pontious

customer_reviews.title: When I got this phone i was very excited for ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got this phone i was very excited for it. Unfortunately, it will not stay on, when its on it runs extremely slow, and i am overall displeased. I will be sending this phone back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this phone since last fall and he kept telling me what a great phone it was. When I came up for my upgrade I decided to give it a try. I was very nervous as it is my first smartphone and it does not disappoint! I have had it for one month and learn something new everyday. Very user friendly. Battery life is excellent, camera is awesome. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cojax

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: returned within the week of purchase due to phone not being compatible with the current Verizon network
customer_reviews.author: LatoyaK

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! Fast
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Fast, full of features and clever personalizing options. I love the rear placement of the volume and on/off buttons...no more hitting them by accident when holding the phone...and, coupled with the double-tap screen on/off option, I will never go back. The only gripe is that the video auto focus can have trouble locking in.
customer_reviews.author: B&O

customer_reviews.title: Sold with non-OEM replacement screen | Cracked in weeks
customer_reviews.text: In a short time I have managed to put two cracks in the screen. The cracks were made MUCH easier AND are unlike the cracks to the OEM screen which came stock on my original LG G2. I believe that the phone was sold with a low quality replacement screen which cracks from minimal impact. Therefore, 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: great battery life, but screen flickers
customer_reviews.text: great looking phone, best part is the battery i can go without charging for 2 days with moderate used. Screen is clear, but after a few days using it the screen flickers. so ill be return this for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: MIXED feelings...KNOWN issues with screen
customer_reviews.text: I really have mixed feelings.....overall a great phone UNTIL it stopped working. Like MANY others, i had the dreaded screen issues with the horizontal band across the top of the screen becoming unresponsive. I had to return it for a refund. Just be aware of this KNOWN issue before you purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome display with incredible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly powerful phone with a beautiful 1080p display. I think my biggest surprise is the battery life. I can easily go a full day of fairly heavy use and still have plenty of juice left in the tank. Pushed to the limit you cancan squeeze about 5 to 6 hours of on screen time which was double my previous phone the Galaxy Note I I. button placement on the rear of the phone does take some adjustment but within a few days it felt natural.
customer_reviews.author: Chistopher S. Gentilello

customer_reviews.title: but it struggles to keep a good GPS signal
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, received as advertised. Phone works well, but it struggles to keep a good GPS signal. It is refurb, so I can live with this for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Enga030

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only inconvenience is that the back buttons are very small, compared to other versions of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Timme

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied & happy with the purchase and product
customer_reviews.text: I rated 5 stars because I got the best deal from this purchase (no down payment and free shipping). The LG G2 phone is a very high quality product comparing to SAMSUNG and iPHONE. I think this is the cell phone with the best camera. LG should spend money for its advertisement to attract more customers. I recommend LG G2 phone to anyone who's tired of an expensive and tiny iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Mega Bob

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever
customer_reviews.text: I got an phone from here about a month ago and soon as I got it there was something wrong. One part of the phone won't let you touch it and it keep shutting on and off. Now it's clicking on every app without me touching it. My brother got him and his girl a phone and it barely works. Sorry, but I will never buy a phone from here again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone exchanged it for white model. Lg is making its way to the top. Iphone and samsung should be worried
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: Flickering screen
customer_reviews.text: Do not like phone to well cause the screen flickers and starts doing things on its own. I would return it but screen has slight crack in it now due to frustration from trying to stop screen from flickering. Other than that the phone works fine just wish it didn't flicker sometimes. Plan on ordering different phone later
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, Best phone I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I cant complain. always responsive, I have downloaded twice as many apps as my old phone and still have room for more. only thing that doesn't always work is the "Knock on/off" feature but thats not a big deal to me
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: I gave this phone to my daughter and she loves it! It takes the most beautiful photos and the other features deliver as advertised. She has not had any problem with the placement of the function buttons.
customer_reviews.author: LUZ

customer_reviews.title: Phone is Awesome... Lookout Galaxy Note 3
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Amazon delivered within 48hrs phone arrived with my previous number already ported. Quad core processor, high capacity battery that's still ultra thin, and infrared blaster turns this phone into a true universal remote and it's 2/3 cheaper than a Galaxy Note 3. No volume or power buttons on the sides is different, my fingers still look for them there but I'm happily adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: JPeeZee

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!! 😃
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the LG G2! I definitely like the knock feature and the button location! Hands down the best phone I have had! :-)
customer_reviews.author: smile01

customer_reviews.title: Phone only shows a black screen with the time on ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone only shows a black screen with the time on it. Doesn't let me do anything else. Tried turning it on and off and still the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: The LG G2 is probably my favorite phone I've owned so far. After rooting it and installing the kit Kat ROM from the G3 and enabling Googles new runtime for android it works great. Never lags and the display looks fantastic. The only funny thing is the lock button being right on the back between the volume rockers, but you can tap on the screen to lock and unlock it and you get used to the funny position of the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin C.

customer_reviews.title: I knew it was used, but thought it worked better.
customer_reviews.text: It's slow, no sound and the speaker phone does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Phone worked as advertised. Shipping was slow. And I had to settle for a black phone when I ordered white but all in all everything worked
customer_reviews.author: THE BULL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, there is absolutely nothing wrong with it, sometimes it heats up with certain apps or when it's charging though, which is to be expected!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This was in great condition. It just had a rub mark on the power button. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: GatorTech of Winter Haven

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone. I enjoy everything about it. But the biggest downfall is the battery is bad I can't keep a charge whatsoever. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: kathy bolin

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Large screen but very light and slim. Button placement really a nonfactor. Works smoothly with no lag. Beautiful pics with quick shutter speed. My favorite feature is andriod integration with google. Looking up directions with google maps on my Macbook that automatically appear on the phone. I have previously owned a motorola photon and iphone 4s.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Baboolal

customer_reviews.title: I made the right choice
customer_reviews.text: This phone, although larger than my old iPhone, is a joy to use. I've gotten used to the size. It worked much better overseas than my wife's iPhone. She is anxiously awaiting the time when her contract is up so she can get an LG. i do wish the voicemail access was less cumbersome. But the screen size is wonderful, and the voice quality is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: My deepest apology. Didn't suit me at all. ...
customer_reviews.text: My deepest apology. Didn't suit me at all. Not able to print return labels for item. Again, my deepest apology NOT able give five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best phone out there!!!!!!!!!!!!!! If i had to pick a negative it would be that there is no external memory to add more memory. Although 32g memory is good but if there were a 64g version or the ability to add a SD card would make this perfect. Oh yeah upgrade this to 4.4 KitKat and it's all good!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life, large screen, fast and capable
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is incredible for such a powerful device with a screen that is viewable from almost any angle with astonishing brightness and contrast ratio. The ergonomics are spot on and the buttons on the back are exactly where they should be on all other phones. The weight and thickness of the phone are also very low and is impressive for a device that packs capable hardware. I would have no other phone. A+ with honors.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ill never leave this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone! Better then the iphone 5s and galaxy combined. The gestures are wonderful, the display and camera are the best I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: I have had my phone for a month and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had my phone for a month and it already not working right. Started freezing up on me last week and as of this past Monday i am no longer able to tap on the phone screen to turn it on. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly A Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: 4 days in ..and i am in love
customer_reviews.text: it works perfectly, fast smooth efficient with a great software. Buy it its better than the Samsung S4. the only con is the speakers arnt loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Aakash

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. I bought this phone used and I can't use the top half of my screen and also it goes haywire and starts opening up apps or internet or changing pages on screen for no reason what so ever. I really regret buying this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: one of the best performing phones I've ever had I would recommend this phone to anyonehas a nice large screen for easy web browsing takes phenomenal picturesand is ultra slim nothing bad at all to say about this phone
customer_reviews.author: Joey Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone in Febuary and it has already stopped working the screen doesn't turn on for no reason it has not been dropped. I could still get calls but the screen is black.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Lg G2
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipping, good phone. An excellent option for an upgrade, especially nice after having the same phone for four years.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

product_meta.title: LG G2, White 32GB (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description:
Service Provider:verizon| Color:White| Size:32 GBThe first smartphone in LG's premium "G" Series, the LG G2 for Verizon Wireless brings everything together in a device with comfortable, functional, convenient and beautiful design. Powered by Android 4.2.2 and a super-fast 2.26 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 quad-core processor, the 4G LTE-enabled LG G2 allows you to run multiple apps at once, browse the Web, or enjoy video and games seamlessly. And the 5.2-inch Full HD display is the largest display designed for one-handed operation. The LG G2 offers a unique, forward-thinking design that's actually a bit backwards by placing all the buttons on the rear of the device (instead of along the sides). Moving the main buttons to the back of the phone gives you more control since this is where your index fingers are naturally located -- you'll wonder why they haven't always been there. Researchers have also found that moving the buttons also results in fewer dropped phones when adjusting the volume while talking. Capture sharp pictures and smooth videos with the G2's 13-megapixel rear camera, which features Optical Image Stabilization (OIS) technology and Full HD 1080p video recording. The LG G2 comes with 32 GB of internal storage (22 GB of user available storage) and up to 18.2 hours of talk time.

AMAZON.COM


Super-fast performance, a seamless user experience, and long-lasting battery. The first smartphone in LG's premium "G" Series, the LG G2 for Verizon Wireless brings everything together in a device with comfortable, functional, convenient and beautiful design. Powered by Android 4.2.2 and a super-fast 2.26 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 quad-core processor, the 4G LTE-enabled LG G2 allows you to run multiple apps at once, browse the Web, or enjoy video and games seamlessly. And the 5.2-inch Full HD display is the largest display designed for one-handed operation.

The LG G2 offers a unique, forward-thinking design that's actually a bit backwards by placing all the buttons on the rear of the device (instead of along the sides). Moving the main buttons to the back of the phone gives you more control since this is where your index fingers are naturally located -- you'll wonder why they haven't always been there. Researchers have also found that moving the buttons also results in fewer dropped phones when adjusting the volume while talking.

Capture sharp pictures and smooth videos with the G2's 13-megapixel rear camera, which features Optical Image Stabilization (OIS) technology and Full HD 1080p video recording. The LG G2 comes with 32 GB of internal storage (22 GB of user available storage) and up to 18.2 hours of talk time.

EDGE-TO-EDGE DISPLAY
Enjoy an immersive viewing experience that fits perfectly in your hand with G2's 5.2-inch Full HD in-plane switching (IPS) display. Its sharp, 423 pixels-per-inch resolution shows off every detail, while its IPS display gives you bright whites and rich colors with a 16:9 cinema-like presentation. In addition to the expansive viewing experience, LG's innovative Dual Routing technology reduced the phone's bezel to a mere 2.65mm on the side edge. For more efficient energy usage, the LG G2 employs Graphic RAM (GRAM) technology, which reduces the display’s energy use by up to 26 percent on a still frame and increases overall usage time on the device by approximately 10 percent.

GO FURTHER BETWEEN CHARGES
The G2's step design 3,000 mAh battery gives you impressive power, without compromising style. With SiO+ technology (an enhanced version of the lithium-ion batteries), the G2's battery provides maximum storage capacity and long-lasting efficiency, with a thinner profile than traditional batteries. You'll get up to 18.2 of talk time and up to 275 hours (11.4 days) of standby time).

13-MEGAPIXEL CAMERA WITH OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZATION
Capturing important moments in shaky conditions is a breeze with the rear camera's Optical Image Stabilization (OIS), which maintains focus while you hold the camera for less blur in photos and less shaking in videos --even in low-light settings. The Multi-Point Autofocus improves focus and depth of field with 9 AF points, especially for images with multiple faces or moving objects, while the Super Resolution Zoom provides more detail and sharper zoom quality, helping maintain clarity with 8 times the normal digital zoom. With the Dual Recording/Dual Camera feature, you can activate the front and rear cameras simultaneously to put both you and your subject in the shot with picture-in-picture technology.

The 13-megapixel rear camera also captures video in Full HD 1080p resolution. The Audio Zoom feature helps to focus in on what you want to hear by using multiple stereo mics to amplify sound from a specified angle and de-emphasizing the surrounding noise for video recording and playback. The rear camera is complemented by a 2-megapixel front camera for video chats on the go.

LG G2
SPEC HIGHLIGHTS
 * 3G/4G LTE connectivity
   
   
 * Android 4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) operating system
   
   
 * 2.26 GHz Snapdragon 800 quad-core processor
   
   
 * 5.2-inch touchscreen IPS display (1080 x 1920) 
   
   
 * 13-MP rear camera (with Full HD 1080p video) + Optical Image Stabilization
   
   
 * Front 2-MP camera
   
   
 * 32 GB storage + 2 GB of RAM
   
   
 * Wireless-N Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.0+ NFC
   
   
 * GPS for navigation and location services
   
   
 * Up to 18.2 hours of usage time
   
   

Designed with the power and volume buttons on the back of the phone. STUDIO QUALITY HI-FI SOUND
The powerful Snapdragon 800 processor also helps the G2 to boast impressive sound features such as Hi-Fi sound playback and HD multichannel audio for enhanced sound quality. The LG G2 features 24-bit/192 kHz Hi-Fi playback that reproduces studio-like quality sound, far superior to a CD.

LG ENHANCEMENTS
QSlide Function. Multitask efficiently with the ability to open two additional windows over your main screen, and adjust their window size and transparency.

QuickMemo. Write or draw on any screen using just a finger, adding a personal touch to everything. And with On-Call Notes, jot down ideas during a call and access them later on from G2's call log entry.

QuickRemote. Turn your G2 into a programmable remote to control multiple compatible electronic devices such as TVs, cable set-top-boxes, audio systems, and even air conditioners.

Capture Plus. Save a full Web page rather than a limited screen capture.

Clip Tray. Lets you copy and store multiple items, such as a screen shot, to a PC-like clipboard for use in other applications.

Slide Aside. Move between up to three apps at once, by using three fingers to slide your current screen aside, and access another app.

Guest Mode. Customize the G2's experience with two modes -- one for yourself and one for a child or guest -- keeping your personal information and device settings safer. Access Guest Mode by unlocking the device with a separate lock screen pattern, letting you control which apps are available for a different user.

KnockON. A simple knocking gesture is all it takes to wake G2's display without picking it up or pressing the power key. G2 senses the gesture and turns the display on or off automatically.


VERIZON'S 4G LTE NETWORK
Covering over 90 percent of the U.S. population (287 million people across the country), the Verizon Wireless 4G LTE (Long Term Evolution) network provides average download data rates of 5-12 megabits per second (Mbps) and 2-5 Mbps on the uplink in real-world, loaded network environments.

You'll be able to stream HD movies without the annoyance of constant pauses to buffer the video stream--as well as quickly download HD-quality movies right to your phone in minutes. Additionally, you'll be able to download a new song file in about 4 seconds or upload a photo to your favorite social networking site in about 6 seconds.

With the enhanced security of 4G LTE, you'll be able to maximize productivity and efficiency while you're out of the confines of your office with the ability to tap into most VPN networks with less waiting and faster responsiveness. You'll be able upload 10 MB presentations back to your team in less than 25 seconds.

In areas serviced only by 3G, you can expect download speeds of 600 Kbps to 1.4 Mbps and upload speeds of 500 to 800 Kbps in Mobile Broadband coverage area.

Google Now. ANDROID 4.2 (JELLY BEAN) OS
Fast, fluid, and smooth, the Android 4.2 operating system (nicknamed Jelly Bean) offers effortless movement between home screens -- like turning the pages of a book. And it includes faster orientation changes, quicker switching between recent apps, and smoother and more consistent rendering throughout your mobile device. And widgets work like magic. As you place widgets on the screen, everything else automatically moves to make room. When they're too big, widgets resize on their own. 


Browse and download thousands of free and paid apps from around the world via Google Play or the Amazon Appstore for Android. 

Smooth Operator. More reactive and uniform touch responses mean you can almost feel the pixels beneath as your finger moves across the screen. .

Live in the Now. With Google Now, you get the right information at just the right time -- before you even ask. It can tell you today's weather before you start your day, or when the next train will arrive as you're standing on the platform. .

Photo Sphere Camera. Snap pictures in every direction -- up, down, and all around you -- and have them come together into incredible, immersive photo spheres that put you right inside the scene.

Smarter Keyboard with Gesture Typing. Just glide your finger over the letters you want to type, and lift after each word. You don't have to worry about spaces because they're added automatically for you.

Beam Photos and Videos. With Android Beam, you can easily share your photos and videos. 






The Amazon app suite is one swipe from the device’s main home screen. Sign in using your Amazon.com account. SEAMLESS ACCESS TO DIGITAL CONTENT AND SHOPPING WITH AMAZON APP SUITE
The Amazon app suiteprovides seamless access to Amazon digital content and shopping right from your phone’s home screen. Interact with Amazon digital content you already own, access over 23 million games, books, apps, and songs, as well as shop millions of physical products in a single, fully-integrated, and easy-to-use experience.

ALL THE CONTENT
Get instant access to over 23 million games, books, apps, and songs including all of the most popular Android apps and games, over 20 million songs to download or instantly stream, and over one million Kindle books in the Kindle Store, including New York Times best sellers and new releases.

SEAMLESS SHOPPING
Instantly access Earth’s biggest selection with millions of physical products available to search or browse with the integrated mobile shopping experience, plus all of the benefits of shopping on Amazon, including personalized recommendations, customer reviews, 1-Click ordering, Prime FREE Two-Day shipping on over 15 million items, and more.

SINGLE SIGN IN
Enter your Amazon.com login just once to access all of Amazon Mobile Shopping, Kindle, MP3, and Amazon Appstore for Android apps, receive personalized recommendations, and interact with the Amazon digital content you already own right from your phone’s home screen.

"BUY ONCE, ENJOY EVERYWHERE "
With apps available on the largest number of devices and platforms, Amazon makes it easy for you to access your content anytime, anywhere, from virtually any device or platform you choose. You can read and sync your Kindle books across any device with the Kindle app installed, including Android phones and tablets, Windows 8 tablets, PC, Mac, iPad, iPhone, and in your web browser with Kindle Cloud Reader.
